notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

collation.p: Quires of mostly 10 leaves each, marked with catchwords and signatures at the end (only partly preserved).

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi semi-cursive script, unpunctuated, of the 15th century. Yosef Foah: inscribed with his name in the colophon, folio 37r.

binding.p: Post-1600. Brown leather, blind tooled. Spine: 'Tractatus de Logica. Hebr. Brit. Mus. Jure Empt. 18,227.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Purchased through Adolphus Asher, Berlin bookseller and dealer to the British Museum 1840-1853: inscribed, folio [38v] (fse001v).
